hero.title: Find viral ideas for your Reels
hero.subtitle: Automatically analyze your competitors, track viral trends, and get daily content inspiration for Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts

pricing.sectionSubtitle: Choose a flexible plan for any business size

items.question: How does competitor tracking work?
items.answer: Our AI automatically monitors your competitors' social media accounts and analyzes their content performance, engagement rates, and viral trends.

items.question: Which platforms are supported?
items.answer: We support Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts. More platforms coming soon.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. No questions asked.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! Start with our free plan to test the basic features before upgrading.
